2014-03-14-drawing-in-progress-boktai-up.title: Drawing in Progress: Boktai (Update #3)
2014-03-14-drawing-in-progress-boktai-up.__content:
Quick update: I masked out the background, plus I added a layout sketch over the top, to show the elements I'd like to add next: some enemies from the game and Otenko, his mentor.

Boktai update, check it! #illustration #boktai #doom pic.twitter.com/7eFxoURPb2

— Cryptacular (@Cryptacular) March 7, 2014
